channel.title: animation on Aela Wild
channel.description: Recent content in animation on Aela Wild

item.title: Making of Stars of Stone
item.description: Now that the short is done I have can finally share the years of footage and photos documenting the making-of process. I’m getting those into video format for YouTube, so expect a few short videos on the puppets, sets, and deleted scenes. Watch this space!

item.title: Stars of Stone
item.description: Great news, Rook’s first adventure is complete. It’s currently doing the rounds of some film festivals, so I can’t share it publicly or it would be disqualified. But luckily donors don’t count against it, so my lovely Patreon supporters get early access now. Here’s a little teaser. I would love to know what you think!
